quote.introtext: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
quote.text: Ya Seen.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: I swear by the Quran full of wisdom;
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: Most surely you are one of the apostles,
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: On a right way.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: A revelation of the Mighty, the Merciful.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: That you may warn a people whose fathers were not warned, so they are heedless.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: Certainly the word has proved true of most of them, so they do not believe.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: Surely We have placed chains on their necks, and these reach up to their chins, so they have their heads raised aloft.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: And We have made before them a barrier and a barrier behind them, then We have covered them over so that they do not see.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: And it is alike to them whether you warn them or warn them not: they do not believe.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: You can only warn him who follows the reminder and fears the Beneficent God in secret; so announce to him forgiveness and an honorable reward.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: Surely We give life to the dead, and We write down what they have sent before and their footprints, and We have recorded everything in a clear writing.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: And set out to them an example of the people of the town, when the messengers came to it.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: When We sent to them two, they rejected both of them, then We strengthened (them) with a third, so they said: Surely we are messengers to you.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: They said: You are naught but mortals like ourselves, nor has the Beneficent God revealed anything; you only lie.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: They said: Our Lord knows that we are most surely messengers to you.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: And nothing devolves on us but a clear deliverance (of the message).
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: They said: Surely we augur evil from you; if you do not desist, we will certainly stone you, and there shall certainly afflict you a painful chastisement from us.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: They said: Your evil fortune is with you; what! if you are reminded! Nay, you are an extravagant people.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: And from the remote part of the city there came a man running, he said: O my people! follow the messengers;
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: Follow him who does not ask you for reward, and they are the followers of the right course;
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: And what reason have I that I should not serve Him Who brought me into existence? And to Him you shall be brought back;
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: What! shall I take besides Him gods whose intercession, If the Beneficent God should desire to afflict me with a harm, shall not avail me aught, nor shall they be able to deliver me?
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: In that case I shall most surely be in clear error:
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: Surely I believe in your Lord, therefore hear me.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: It was said: Enter the garden. He said: O would that my people had known
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: Of that on account of which my Lord has forgiven me and made me of the honored ones!
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: And We did not send down upon his people after him any hosts from heaven, nor do We ever send down.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: It was naught but a single cry, and lo! they were still.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: Alas for the servants! there comes not to them an apostle but they mock at him.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: Do they not consider how many of the generations have We destroyed before them, because they do not turn to them?
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: And all of them shall surely be brought before Us.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: And a sign to them is the dead earth: We give life to it and bring forth from it grain so they eat of it.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: And We make therein gardens of palms and grapevines and We make springs to flow forth in it,
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: That they may eat of the fruit thereof, and their hands did not make it; will they not then be grateful?
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: Glory be to Him Who created pairs of all things, of what the earth grows, and of their kind and of what they do not know.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: And a sign to them is the night: We draw forth from it the day, then lo! they are in the dark;
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: And the sun runs on to a term appointed for it; that is the ordinance of the Mighty, the Knowing.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: And (as for) the moon, We have ordained for it stages till it becomes again as an old dry palm branch.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: Neither is it allowable to the sun that it should overtake the moon, nor can the night outstrip the day; and all float on in a sphere.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: And a sign to them is that We bear their offspring in the laden ship.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: And We have created for them the like of it, what they will ride on.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: And if We please, We can drown them, then there shall be no succorer for them, nor shall they be rescued,
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: But (by) mercy from Us and for enjoyment till a time.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: And when it is said to them: Guard against what is before you and what is behind you, that mercy may be had on you.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: And there comes not to them a communication of the communications of their Lord but they turn aside from it.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: And when it is said to them: Spend out of what Allah has given you, those who disbelieve say to those who believe: Shall we feed him whom, if Allah please, He could feed? You are in naught but clear error.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: And they say: When will this threat come to pass, if you are truthful?
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: They wait not for aught but a single cry which will overtake them while they yet contend with one another.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: So they shall not be able to make a bequest, nor shall they return to their families.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: And the trumpet shall be blown, when lo! from their graves they shall hasten on to their Lord.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: They shall say: O woe to us! who has raised us up from our sleeping-place? This is what the Beneficent God promised and the apostles told the truth.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: There would be naught but a single cry, when lo! they shall all be brought before Us;
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: So this day no soul shall be dealt with unjustly in the least; and you shall not be rewarded aught but that which you did.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: Surely the dwellers of the garden shall on that day be in an occupation quite happy.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: They and their wives shall be in shades, reclining on raised couches.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: They shall have fruits therein, and they shall have whatever they desire.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: Peace: a word from a Merciful Lord.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: And get aside today, O guilty ones!
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: Did I not charge you, O children of Adam! that you should not serve the Shaitan? Surely he is your open enemy,
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: And that you should serve Me; this is the right way.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: And certainly he led astray numerous people from among you. What! could you not then understand?
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: This is the hell with which you were threatened.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: Enter into it this day because you disbelieved.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: On that day We will set a seal upon their mouths, and their hands shall speak to Us, and their feet shall bear witness of what they earned.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: And if We please We would certainly put out their eyes, then they would run about groping for the way, but how should they see?
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: And if We please We would surely transform them in their place, then they would not be able to go on, nor will they return.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: And whomsoever We cause to live long, We reduce (him) to an abject state in constitution; do they not then understand?
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: And We have not taught him poetry, nor is it meet for him; it is nothing but a reminder and a plain Quran,
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: That it may warn him who would have life, and (that) the word may prove true against the unbelievers.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: Do they not see that We have created cattle for them, out of what Our hands have wrought, so they are their masters?
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: And We have subjected them to them, so some of them they have to ride upon, and some of them they eat.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: And therein they have advantages and drinks; will they not then be grateful?
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: And they have taken gods besides Allah that they may be helped.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: (But) they shall not be able to assist them, and they shall be a host brought up before them.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: Therefore let not their speech grieve you; surely We know what they do in secret and what they do openly.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: Does not man see that We have created him from the small seed? Then lo! he is an open disputant.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: And he strikes out a likeness for Us and forgets his own creation. Says he: Who will give life to the bones when they are rotten?
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: Say: He will give life to them Who brought them into existence at first, and He is Cognizant of all creation,
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: He Who has made for you the fire (to burn) from the green tree, so that with it you kindle (fire).
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: Is not He Who created the heavens and the earth able to create the like of them? Yea! and He is the Creator (of all), the Knower.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: His command, when He intends anything, is only to say to it: Be, so it is.
quote.author: Qur'an

quote.text: Therefore glory be to Him in Whose hand is the kingdom of all things, and to Him you shall be brought back.
quote.author: Qur'an
